text: "The Twilight Zone" is a 1976 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It is the leading single from their fourth studio album 2112. It is based on the two episodes of The Twilight Zone. Rush dedicated the song to the memory of the creator Rod Serling. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: The Twilight Zone (Rush song)
